column4: Exclusive: U.S. sanctions curb Microsoft sales to hundreds of Russian firms
column5: MOSCOW Two of Microsoft's official distributors in Russia have imposed restrictions on sales of Microsoft software to more than 200 Russian companies following new U.S. sanctions  according to notifications circulated by the distributors.

column4: Intel asks customers to stop using faulty patches
column5: Jan 22 Intel Corp has asked computer makers to stop rolling out a set of faulty patches it issued to fix security flaws in its chips and instead start testing an updated version.
